user.title: Setup Internet Cafe Automation
user.description:
Please paste CSV content with room configurations.

CSV format example:
```
room_name,entity_id,ip_address
Double Room 38-39,device_tracker.hostname38,192.168.1.38
Double Room 38-39,climate.ac_38,
Double Room 38-39,light.room38_main,
```

Copy from Excel: Select all → Ctrl+C → Paste here
Copy from file: Open with Notepad → Select all → Copy → Paste here
